page.title: 19Refuse Transfer Station
page.content: Rubbish from all over the district is brought to this site for disposal.The site was originally an incinerator and all rubbish was burnt and disposed of locally.However the incinerator was closed three years ago and rubbish is now prepared for disposal at a large site in Sandwich. Our site consists of a large pit 30 feet deep. This pit contains two days rubbish.A crane lifts the rubbish into a hopper which moves the refuse into a crushing machine which then presses the remains into a container.The container holds 15 tons of compressed rubbish.On average 119 tons of rubbish is moved every day.The workmen wish the site was still an incinerator, where the work was much more interesting.The whole site really smells.The site is run by Kent County Council.
